Text:
Hey, thanks for taking the time to upload these games; spreading a lot of joy (and pain if you're a bengals fan like me).  

Need to ask what I hope is just an ignorant question with a simple fix - what kind of player/device do I need to open/play this kind of file? (.540p is it?...just can't seem to find any info on this kind of extension.) 

All the best, and appreciate the help.
